name: VauxWall East Climbing Centre
content_summary: **First time climbing?** X # Indoor Climbing near Vauxhall and Kennington [Opening times](https://londonclimbingcentres.co.uk/londonclimbingcentres.co.uk#opening-times) ## Your first climb It’s so easy to start climbing, with multiple options for those new to the sport. Join a Bouldering Basics class, where an experienced instructor will cover basic techniques and safety tips for an hour. Or you’re welcome to drop in and try it for yourself independently, once you’ve watched our online induction...
